verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,
Speak unto the children of Israel , and say unto them, When a man shall make a singular vow , the persons \add shall be\add* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by thy estimation.
And thy estimation shall be of the male from twenty years old even unto sixty years old , even thy estimation shall be fifty shekels of silver , after the shekel of the sanctuary.
And if it \add be\add* a female , then thy estimation shall be thirty shekels.
And if \add it be\add* from five years old even unto twenty years old , then thy estimation shall be of the male twenty shekels , and for the female ten shekels.

And if \add it be\add* from a month old even unto five years old , then thy estimation shall be of the male five shekels of silver , and for the female thy estimation \add shall be\add* three shekels of silver.
And if \add it be\add* from sixty years old and above ; if \add it be\add* a male , then thy estimation shall be fifteen shekels , and for the female ten shekels.
But if he be poorer than thy estimation , then he shall present himself before the priest , and the priest shall value him; according to his ability that vowed shall the priest value him.

And if \add it be\add* a beast , whereof men bring an offering unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all that \add any man\add* giveth of such unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be holy.
He shall not alter it, nor change it, a good for a bad , or a bad for a good : and if he shall at all change beast for beast , then it and the exchange thereof shall be holy.
And if \add it be\add* any unclean beast , of which they do not offer a sacrifice unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, then he shall present the beast before the priest :
And the priest shall value it, whether it be good or bad : as thou valuest it, \add who art\add* the priest , so shall it be.\f + \fr 27.12 \ft as…: Heb. according to thy estimation, O priest, etc\f*
But if he will at all redeem it, then he shall add a fifth \add part\add* thereof unto thy estimation. \p

¶ And when a man shall sanctify his house \add to be\add* holy unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, then the priest shall estimate it, whether it be good or bad : as the priest shall estimate it, so shall it stand.
And if he that sanctified it will redeem his house , then he shall add the fifth \add part\add* of the money of thy estimation unto it, and it shall be his.

And if a man shall sanctify unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add some part\add* of a field of his possession , then thy estimation shall be according to the seed thereof: an homer of barley seed \add shall be valued\add* at fifty shekels of silver.\f + \fr 27.16 \ft an…: or, the land of an homer, etc\f*
If he sanctify his field from the year of jubile , according to thy estimation it shall stand.

But if he sanctify his field after the jubile , then the priest shall reckon unto him the money according to the years that remain , even unto the year of the jubile , and it shall be abated from thy estimation.
And if he that sanctified the field will in any wise redeem it, then he shall add the fifth \add part\add* of the money of thy estimation unto it, and it shall be assured to him.
And if he will not redeem the field , or if he have sold the field to another man , it shall not be redeemed any more.
But the field , when it goeth out in the jubile , shall be holy unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as a field devoted ; the possession thereof shall be the priest’s.
And if \add a man\add* sanctify unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* a field which he hath bought , which \add is\add* not of the fields of his possession ;

Then the priest shall reckon unto him the worth of thy estimation , \add even\add* unto the year of the jubile : and he shall give thine estimation in that day , \add as\add* a holy thing unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
In the year of the jubile the field shall return unto him of whom it was bought , \add even\add* to him to whom the possession of the land \add did belong\add*.
And all thy estimations shall be according to the shekel of the sanctuary : twenty gerahs shall be the shekel. \p

¶ Only the firstling of the beasts , which should be the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* firstling , no man shall sanctify it; whether \add it be\add* ox , or sheep : it \add is\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 27.26  t firstling of: Heb. firstborn, etc *

And if \add it be\add* of an unclean beast , then he shall redeem \add it\add* according to thine estimation , and shall add a fifth \add part\add* of it thereto: or if it be not redeemed , then it shall be sold according to thy estimation.

Notwithstanding no devoted thing , that a man shall devote unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of all that he hath, \add both\add* of man and beast , and of the field of his possession , shall be sold or redeemed : every devoted thing \add is\add* most holy unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
None devoted , which shall be devoted of men , shall be redeemed ; \add but\add* shall surely be put to death.

And all the tithe of the land , \add whether\add* of the seed of the land , \add or\add* of the fruit of the tree , \add is\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: \add it is\add* holy unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
And if a man will at all redeem \add ought\add* of his tithes , he shall add thereto the fifth \add part\add* thereof.
And concerning the tithe of the herd , or of the flock , \add even\add* of whatsoever passeth under the rod , the tenth shall be holy unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
He shall not search whether it be good or bad , neither shall he change it: and if he change it at all , then both it and the change thereof shall be holy ; it shall not be redeemed.
These \add are\add* the commandments , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded Moses for the children of Israel in mount Sinai.
